channel.title: Oh My God. Girl throws puppies into a river
channel.description:
[size=25pt][b]If you can't handle animal abuse don't watch it.[/b][/size] I myself watched like 10 seconds, then I shut it off. Annnnyyways, A video was posted on youtube showing a girl throwing puppies into a river, now deleted but it is still on the net. 4chan quickly spread it on /b/, and I guess they found the girl and I guess they are harassing her, hacking her facebook account, ect.
Discuss.
[size=8pt]Video: [url=http://valleywag.gawker.com/5626105/4chan-on-the-hunt-for-puppy+throwing-girl]http://valleywag.gawker.com/5626105/4chan-on-the-hunt-for-puppy+throwing-girl[/url][/size]

item.title: Oh My God. Girl throws puppies into a river
item.dc:creator: @pkedme pkedme
item.description:
@pkedme wrote:

[quote=“Miss Silabsoft, post:22, topic:358200”]not the best way of killing them off but hey sometimes you got to do it and this video does say if the puppies are healthy or not. its highly morbid to record such scenes but its the Internet so someone out there is going to find it amusing. as for all of you all /rage over it “grow up please”

  1. if they are her dogs she should have the right to do what she wants with them
  2. if they are sick killing them off is for the better.
  3. if its simply 1 litter too many again its better to kill them off then to just let them wander around aimlessly

If she stole the dogs its obviously another case.[/quote]

silab fuck you! you fucking retarded ass bitch! who gives a fuck if there hers or not, she cant be fucking doing this shit.

go fucking die. you piece of shit bitch.

Read full topic
item.source: Oh My God. Girl throws puppies into a river

item.title: Oh My God. Girl throws puppies into a river
item.dc:creator: @pl0x15 pl0x15
item.description:
@pl0x15 wrote:

Correct me if I’m wrong, but these puppies didn’t need to drown’d if they were as young as some of you say the impact of hitting that water would’ve crushed them instantly. I mean c’mon whats up with this sick bitch!!! And I totally agree with Mrs Silab and Mopar, if they have something wrong with them they should be shotten, put to “sleep” or other things should be done to prevent any serious pain, but this, this is just sick. Slit that bitches throat Mr Mopar!!!

Read full topic
item.source: Oh My God. Girl throws puppies into a river

item.title: Oh My God. Girl throws puppies into a river
item.dc:creator: @rawr_i_am_scary rawr i am scary
item.description:
@rawr_i_am_scary wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:30, topic:358200”][quote author=Miss Silabsoft link=topic=454706.msg3329807#msg3329807 date=1283385127]

yes recording the killings is wrong however you look at it, the chucking of the puppies also a bit wrong. but how can you say shooting the puppy in the head is any more humane than drowning them.

It is, this is done to diseased Horses and Cows also.

but how can you physically prove a headshot is any less painful than drowning… you really can’t you can say brain activity this and that but you really would have no idea unless you experienced both.
[/quote]
Every living thing on this earth has the right to live! Killing off something without giving it a fighting change is inhumane. Sure, If the animal is majorly sick and has like a 1 in a million change to survive, I can understand, You are putting it out of its misery. As for these puppies, Did you see how fat they were? These puppies were WELL taken care of, and had no reason to be thrown in that river. Did you hear their whine? This means the puppies were not dehydrated at all. These puppies were healthy as a fucking horse, besides worms (FYI - All puppies are born with worms). This just shows how heartless you are Silab, you are now on, and forever will be, my hated list. You are now one of 4 people on that list, (Only person on this forum). Stop poking your nose in where it will offense tons, and are so heartless about. You do not ‘own’ animals, you simply take care of them.[/quote]

Abortion.

Read full topic
item.source: Oh My God. Girl throws puppies into a river

item.title: Oh My God. Girl throws puppies into a river
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:128, topic:358200”]http://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/worldnews/article-1309135/Claim-puppies-thrown-river-girl-found.html?ITO=1490

Nyea.[/quote]
Those puppies are not the same. Look at how flat the hair it while they are in the bucket, and how fluffy they are in the womens home. She is just looking for some ‘fame’ and free money.

Read full topic
item.source: Oh My God. Girl throws puppies into a river

item.title: Oh My God. Girl throws puppies into a river
item.dc:creator: @im_hard im hard
item.description:
@im_hard wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:24, topic:358200”][quote author=Miss Silabsoft link=topic=454706.msg3329719#msg3329719 date=1283381629]
not the best way of killing them off but hey sometimes you got to do it and this video does say if the puppies are healthy or not. its highly morbid to record such scenes but its the Internet so someone out there is going to find it amusing. as for all of you all /rage over it “grow up please”

  1. if they are her dogs she should have the right to do what she wants with them
  2. if they are sick killing them off is for the better.
  3. if its simply 1 litter too many again its better to kill them off then to just let them wander around aimlessly
    If she stole the dogs its obviously another case.
    [/quote]

I completely agree that there are legitimate reasons for killing animals. Maybe they are sick, starving, have horrible deformities or any number of other reasons. But there is no reason to kill animals this way, at least do it humanely, like shoot them in the head for example. I watched the video, it’s pretty messed up.[/quote]

Or even better, shoot the fucking girl in the head.

Read full topic

item.source: Oh My God. Girl throws puppies into a river

item.title: Oh My God. Girl throws puppies into a river
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:121, topic:358200”][quote author=Miss Silabsoft link=topic=454706.msg3329807#msg3329807 date=1283385127]

yes recording the killings is wrong however you look at it, the chucking of the puppies also a bit wrong. but how can you say shooting the puppy in the head is any more humane than drowning them.

It is, this is done to diseased Horses and Cows also.

but how can you physically prove a headshot is any less painful than drowning… you really can’t you can say brain activity this and that but you really would have no idea unless you experienced both.
[/quote]

Well, they smacked the water pretty hard, which would hurt. Then they had to struggle to try to swim, slowly taking in more and more water before the slowly suffocate and die. Pretty slow and painful.

As opposed to a shot in the head, one second they are perfectly fine (besides whatever reason you are putting them down for) and the next they instantly die a painless death.[/quote]
These puppies were no more than 2 weeks old (though after research, they are supposedly 3 days), they cannot even walk at those ages. So there was no trying to swim, it was basically, a very scary, painful death.

Read full topic
item.source: Oh My God. Girl throws puppies into a river

item.title: Oh My God. Girl throws puppies into a river
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Miss Silabsoft, post:28, topic:358200”][quote author=Frell link=topic=454706.msg3329770#msg3329770 date=1283383598]

yes recording the killings is wrong however you look at it, the chucking of the puppies also a bit wrong. but how can you say shooting the puppy in the head is any more humane than drowning them.

It is, this is done to diseased Horses and Cows also.

[/quote]
but how can you physically prove a headshot is any less painful than drowning… you really can’t you can say brain activity this and that but you really would have no idea unless you experienced both.[/quote]

Well, they smacked the water pretty hard, which would hurt. Then they had to struggle to try to swim, slowly taking in more and more water before the slowly suffocate and die. Pretty slow and painful.

As opposed to a shot in the head, one second they are perfectly fine (besides whatever reason you are putting them down for) and the next they instantly die a painless death.
